title: Link Source Type to CMIP7:

field_guidance.header:
Source types are initially defined in the [WCRP-constants repository](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants). You can view existing source types at https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/WCRP-constants/source_type/

**If your source type is not listed below**, you must first [register it in WCRP-constants](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/issues/new?template=source_type.yml) and wait for it to be approved before linking it here.

Once your source type exists in WCRP-constants, use this form to make it available for use in CMIP7.
